products.title: Seaside (Blackout), Stone - Roller Blind
products.description: The beauty of seaside blackout stone is that it allows you to get lost in the moment like no other contemporary patterned fabric we know of. Just what you need when you want to create the light and homely space you never want to leave. Use blackout stone in the kitchen to add a contemporary touch of style that will allow you to get truly creative. By matching it to the tiling and flooring you'll be able to create a secondary layer that compliments the kitchen units and worktops that so often dominate the heart of the home.

products.title: Splash Tropez Grey Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Splash tropez is an elegant grey/brown hue, with its rich earthy tones it will compliment a vast range of interior colour palettes. The perfect fit roller blind is an effective, no hassle way to fit a blind to any window. The blind comes in a slimline frame and clips directly onto the window, which means no drilling. The framework is also available in 4 different colour options to compliment any room.

products.title: Splash Silver Mist Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Silver mist is a soft mid grey shade, a chic addition to modern interiors. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Mood Fr Voile Cosmic Grey Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their mood voile fabrics are a fabulous modern alternative to the traditional net curtain. Mood fr voile cosmic grey is a semi-translucent stylish, lightgrey roller and is great for freshening up the look of any room. A busy kitchen or living room will benefit from this delicate, translucent design in this modern grey shade, that will leave the space feeling open, light and airy. A flame retardant coating, makes this sheer roller blind a fantastic addition to your living space.

products.description: Their genesis range comes in 6 colour variations and is the perfect choice for a modern look. This dark grey perfect fit roller blind is bang on trend and will add effortless style to any room in your home. The perfect fit aspect of this blind means it can clip straight on to pvc window frames - saving space and meaning no drills or screws. products.title: Woodland, Rosemist - Roman Blind
products.description: This woodland inspired design brings charcoal into alignment with a portfolio of autumnal colours to give your home something to really smile about. Look closer and you'll see the artistry required to create each leafy branch as the fabric takes on a life of its own. Partnering rosemist with a light grey feature wall and dark wooden floor is an inspired way to extend its colour spectrum out into your room.

products.title: Nightshade, Chrome - Day Night Blind
products.description: In silky silver, the nightshade in chrome offers not only style but versatile practicality too. In between the cool grey, double layered fabric sit sliding translucent strips, which can be moved up and down to ensure flexible light control. Combine the chrome with a contemporary all-white kitchen, foregoing conventional colour and opting for a stark look full of clean lines and sharp metallics. Keep the base of the room white, and choose chrome fixtures, fittings, and appliances for a distinct and stunning aesthetic.

products.title: Nightshade, Steel - Day Night Blind
products.description: In the nightshade steel, translucent netting is easily adjusted between double layered fabric to allow more or less privacy and light. The featured cloth is a tightly stitched silver affair, thicker than that of other ranges to further protect from outside lights. Whilst the steel will match a range of colour schemes, it will look particularly striking amidst a navy and white colour scheme in a dining room.

products.title: Rift Softshade Mono Grey Day And Night Blind
products.description: Add the finishing touch to a clean and contemporary interior with the rift softshade mono day and night roller blind. This blind makes creating optimum light levels in your home super easy. The practical design of cool grey fabric panels with translucent voile strips in-between enables you to gain a sense of privacy with partial shading - perfect for making the most of natural light. products.title: Selva, Graphite - Roman Blind
products.description: With its intricately woven stitching in cream, and a contrasting, chenille-like fabric, the selva in graphite is a gorgeously luxurious blind that blends beautifully into the roman curves of the blind. Whilst the blind itself is a classic one, the contrasting cream and slate grey colour combination is contemporary and modern. Add luxe layers of cosiness to your living room by including the graphite to bring warmth and texture to the room.

products.title: Splash Chilli Red Panel Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash chilli red panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The medium red panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm, saturated shade. As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,. 5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make. A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design.

products.title: Splash Ruby Red Panel Blind
products.description: Splash ruby red panel blinds are a fabulous way to dress your window. The saturated red, moisture-resistant fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space. Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe. As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with their 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.

products.title: Splash (Blackout), Code - Loft Blind
products.description: Made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity. With many great colours to choose from, you can easily find something to suit your bathroom decor. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Rocco, Graphite - Roman Blind
products.description: Deep charcoal grey is home to an angular patterning in homely cream in the sumptuous rocco graphite. The main fabric has a plush chenille-feel texture, whilst the cream detailing is a loosely stitched thread with a soft shimmer. Hang the graphite in a contemporary yet luxurious living room. Match the walls to the detailing with a rich cream, and opt for dark grey carpets and patterned rugs. Include splashes of deep red or pretty plum in the form of cushions and throws for additional character and personality.
